name: Mind-to-Mind Communication
description: Developing the ability to transmit and receive thoughts telepathically.

cards.title: Establishing a Telepathic Link
cards.description: Techniques for syncing brainwave patterns and focusing intent for clear mental communication.
cards.bulletpoints: Theta State Induction, Empathic Resonance, Thought Projection
cards.summaryText: Drop into theta, match resonance, and project a clean telepathic link.

cards.title: Receiving and Translating Thought Patterns
cards.description: Enhancing clarity in perceiving thoughts and mental imagery from another mind.
cards.bulletpoints: Sensory Mind Mapping, Symbolic Translation, Conscious Thought Alignment
cards.summaryText: Map the incoming imagery, translate symbols, and keep the channel coherent.
